Name: Ediber
description:
Ediber is a young farmer from Piendam√≥, Cauca, with 28 years of experience. He owns a three-hectare plot where he has planted over 15,000 coffee plants, which he fertilizes with homemade inputs, diligently caring for his fields to ensure optimal growth and health of his crops.

Ediber lives with his wife and stepdaughter in a house that his wife bought several years ago. His wife supports his agricultural activities, helping him with crop processing.

A loan of $5,005,514 COP allows Ediber to purchase organic fertilizers that will enable the sustainable growth of his crops.
